DOC.brief_summary: Epidemiological study demonstrate inverse association cardiovascular event milk dairy product consumption . Evidence human intervention study suggest whey casein may effective blood pressure-lowering , however limited data impact milk proteins vascular function . This research aim compare potential acute chronic impact two main milk protein ( whey casein ) maltodextrin blood pressure vascular function . Furthermore , effect proteins marker insulin resistance , lipid metabolism inflammatory status also investigate 'at-risk ' individual . This research include acute chronic intervention study independently power appropriate outcome measure . This generate different sample size requirement two study ( Actual participant acute study : n=27 , chronic study : n=38 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Milk Proteins , Ambulatory Blood Pressure Vascular Function
DOC.criteria: A signed consent form Blood pressure : 120/80159/99 Age : 3077 year BMI 2040 kg/m2 Glucose < 7 mmol/l ( Not diagnose diabetes ) Chol < 8 mmol/l TAG < 4 mmol/l Normal liver kidney function Haemoglobin ( > 110 g/dl woman ; 140g/dl men ) Milk allergy , lactose allergy Coeliac disease Renal , gastrointestinal , respiratory , endocrine , liver disease cancer Surgery previous 6 month Secondary hypertension Excess alcohol consumption ( drink > 28 unit/wk man ; > 21 unit/wk woman ) Smoker Vegan Taking nutritional supplementation ( e.g . fish oil , protein ) Anaemia
